alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 04 at 5:56PM EDT until July 05 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, until midnight EDT tonight. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, from Wednesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An additional round of brief minor flooding is possible with the evening high tide cycle Thursday.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
